data.title: THE FIRST CENTURY OF THE JOHN CARTER BROWN LIBRARY A HISTORY WITH A GUIDE TO THE COLLECTIONS
data.meta_description: Providence: The John Carter Brown Library, 1946. 8vo. red cloth spine with marbled paper covered boards. vi, 88 pages.
data.text:
Wroth, Lawrence C.

Providence: The John Carter Brown Library, 1946.

8vo.

red cloth spine with marbled paper covered boards.

vi, 88 pages.

Price: $20.00 other currencies

Order Nr. 100871

First edition. Spine lightly rubbed, else a near fine copy. Illustrated. Includes interesting comments on the Americana collector, John Carter Brown, and his relations with the bookseller, Henry Stevens. Printed by D.B. Updike at his Merrymount Press (Smith 973). A variant binding in red.
